reviews.review_content:
Perhaps the most brilliant man you will ever be so lucky to meet, his class is a slow, lumbering affair. He speaks deliberately, sporadically, cryptically, droningly--though with a charming demeanor, a dry, facile wit, and enormous brilliance. The requirements of the class almost make up for the lack of classroom pep: just one term paper. If you're really into the content, his anecdotes, asides and sheer acuity will redeem the in-class incarceration.
Workload:
one paper, 20 pages.
